title: Sampler, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: cross-stitch embroidery on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Gift from Mrs. Edith P. Morgan, Arden Studios, Feb. 1926
dimensions: Frame H x W: 47 x 36.2 cm (18 1/2 x 14 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Dainty rows of soldiers and ladies holding fans, a large bird perched on a stump, and barnyard fowl, embroidered in colored silks on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: silk embroidery on wool foundation
Technique: cross-stitch embroidery on plain weave. Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers. 2008-31-7.
